column4: I can't get java 6.24 working on ubuntu 10.10. Am needing it to play games on pogo
have you tried both sun java and openjdk?
I have tryed sun java, useing there step by step guide. I have not tryed open jdk.
I looked in the installed software, it says open jdk is installed, but its not working
openjdk-jre?
ruam: OpenJDK Java 6 Runyime
tuntime*
runtime- ffs
have you tried sun-java?
ruam: I have not been able to get the open jdk removed so I can install sun java
have you tried using synaptic?
yes
does it give an error if you try to remove openjdk?
nope, it just shows up on the installed software list after I exit the software center
click apply when you mark it for uninstallation
Ok I will try removing it again.
ok its removed. Now how do I install the sun java?
install sun-java-jre
search it in synaptic
sun-java6-jre
Ok that worked perfect. Thank you very much.
